If Statement
```{r}
medium <- "Linkedin"
num_views <- 14

if(medium == "Linkedin"){
  print("Showing Linkedin information")
} else if(medium == "Facebook"){
  print("Showing Facebook information")
} else {
  print("Unknown medium")
}

if(num_views > 15){
  print("You are popular")
} else if(num_views <= 15 & num_views > 10){ 
  print("Your number of views is average")
}else {
  print("Try to be more visible")
}

```

```{r}
result <- ""
number <- 6

if(number < 10){
  if(number < 5){
    result <- "extra small"
  } else {
    result <- "small"
  }
} else if(number < 100){
  result <- "medium"
} else {
  result <- "large"
}

print(result)
```
write a while loop
```{r}
speed <- 64
while(speed > 30){
  print("Slow down!")
  speed <- speed -7
}

speed
```
```{r}
speed <-70
while(speed > 30){
  print(paste("Your speed is", speed))
  if(speed >= 48){
    print("Slow down big time")
    speed <- speed - 11
  } else {
    print("Slow down")
    speed <- speed -6
  }
}
```

Break
```{r}
speed <- 78
while(speed > 30){
  print(paste("Your speed is",speed))
  if(speed > 80){
    break
  }
  
  if(speed > 48){
    print("Slow down big time")
    speed <- speed -11
  } else {
    print("Slow down")
    speed <- speed -6
  }
}
```
